short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Snapshot of all the permissions used by each installed extension.
short.de: Momentaufnahme aller Berechtigungen, die von jeder installierten Erweiterung verwendet werden.
short.es: Instantánea de todos los permisos utilizados por cada extensión instalada.
short.fr: Instantané de toutes les autorisations utilisées par chaque extension installée.
short.hi: प्रत्येक स्थापित एक्सटेंशन द्वारा उपयोग की जाने वाली सभी अनुमतियों का स्नैपशॉट।
short.it: Istantanea di tutte le autorizzazioni utilizzate da ciascuna estensione installata.
short.nl: Momentopname van alle machtigingen die door elke geïnstalleerde extensie worden gebruikt.
short.pl: Migawka wszystkich uprawnień używanych przez każde zainstalowane rozszerzenie.
short.ru: Снимок всех разрешений, используемых каждым установленным расширением.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Missing permissions inspector for Chrome - Snapshot of all the permissions used by each installed extension.

Extension are powerful tools which can modify the browser using various features allowed by browser. While installing an Extension there is a permission prompt which tells what all features will be accessed by the Extension. Post that we have no way to know what an installed add-on is accessing. Permission inspector bridges this gap and shows what all an Extension can do to the browser.

There are two views for this add-on

    Extension-wise: Shows permissions for each Extension.
    Permission-wise: Shows add-ons using each permission.


This Extension is available in following languages:

    de - German
    en - English
    es- Spanish
    fr - French
    hi - Hindi
    it - Italian
    nl - Dutch
    pl - Polish
    pt - Portugese
    ru - Russian
    zh - Chinese(S)
